function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Covid-19 pandemic impact on various industries and businesses","Impact":"Financial fragility, bankruptcy, and international trade disruption","Mitigation":"Implementing economic stimulus, trade deals, and strategic decision-making","Technologies":"LDA, NMF, topic modeling","People":"Small businesses, international trade partners, government, policy makers","Owner":"Governments, policy makers, researchers, industry stakeholders"},{"Description":"Difficulty in training LDA due to time-consuming calculations","Impact":"Requires domain expertise and human interpretation","Mitigation":"Advanced training techniques, automation of interpretation","Technologies":"LDA, NMF, machine learning","People":"Researchers, data scientists","Owner":"Research institutions, tech companies"},{"Description":"Challenges in topic modeling related to human interaction and interpretation","Impact":"Complexity and need for domain expertise","Mitigation":"Integration of human intelligence, flexibility in model design","Technologies":"LDA, NMF, machine learning","People":"End users, domain experts, researchers","Owner":"Tech companies, research institutions"}]}
